TITLE: Sign in
SUB_TITLE: Sign in to manage your account, review your subscription, make a payment, update your info, and more.
PARTNER_LOGIN_REQUIRED_TITLE: Your SiriusXM subscription is managed via {{partnerName}}.
PARTNER_LOGIN_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Please go to {{partnerName}} to manage your SiriusXM subscription.
PAGE_TITLE: Login, Pay Bill & Manage My Account | SiriusXM
IAP_FREE_TIER_PARTNER_LOGIN_REQUIRED_TIT: Looks like one or more of your subscriptions are managed by {{partnerName}}.
IAP_FREE_TIER_PARTNER_LOGIN_REQUIRED_DES:
You can manage those subscriptions directly with {{partnerName}}, or in some cases via the app store or your device settings.

View specific instructions on where to find these options.

For subscriptions acquired directly from SiriusXM, chat with an agent for help logging in.
